detail-page.comment: Deprecated container size for the website

compact.comment: Tailored container size designed for form wizard applications or pages.

normal.comment: The default container size is versatile and suitable for various applications and website pages.

fluid.comment: The container for fullscreen application with a large table for example.

mobile.comment: Default space of a container to left and right side.

tablet.comment: Default space on tablets of a container to left and right side.

desktop.comment: Default space on desktops of a container to left and right side.
